javadoc:
Interface for classes that manage the background color of a layout.  The background color is 
 affected by the current selection and highlight.  Implementers of this class manage the 
 interaction of the selection and highlight to provide a single object from which to get
 background color information.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the overall background color for the entire layout.  If the layout is totally, 
 selected, then this color will be the selection color.  If the layout is highlighted,then
 the color will be the highlight color.  If both, then the color will be the combined color.
 If the color is the same the overall background color of the field panel,
 then null will be returned to indicate that the background color for this layout does not
 need to be painted.
@return the background color for this layout or null if it is the same as the background for
 the field panel.
methods.name: getBackgroundColor
methods.comment:
Returns the overall background color for the entire layout.  If the layout is totally, 
 selected, then this color will be the selection color.  If the layout is highlighted,then
 the color will be the highlight color.  If both, then the color will be the combined color.
 If the color is the same the overall background color of the field panel,
 then null will be returned to indicate that the background color for this layout does not
 need to be painted.

return.comment:
the background color for this layout or null if it is the same as the background for
 the field panel.

methods.name: getPaddingColor
methods.comment:
Returns the color of the padding between fields or null if the color is the same as the
 background color for the layout.

params.name: padIndex
params.comment:
the index of the padding area.  0 represents the gap before the first field.
 a -1 indicates the gap past the last field.

return.comment: the color for indicated gap padding.

methods.name: getFieldBackgroundColorManager
methods.comment:
Returns a FieldBackgroundColorManager to manage the background colors for field 
 indexed by fieldNum.

params.name: fieldNum
params.comment: the index of the field for which to get a colorManager.

return.comment: the FieldBackgroundColorManager for the given field index.

methods.name: getBackgroundColor
methods.comment: Returns the background color at a specific location within the layout.

params.name: location
params.comment: the location in the layout for which to get the background color.

return.comment: the background color at a specific location within the layout.
